pages.title: ComputerCraft
pages.text: ComputerCraft adds Computers, Monitors, Modems, Turtles and more! ComputerCraft's Computers and Turtles are programmed with the easy-to-learn Lua programming language. You can use Redstone and RedPower alongside your devices for the best experience.

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: ComputerCraft has several documentations you can refer to$(br2)$(l:http://www.computercraft.info/wiki/Main_Page)ComputerCraft Wiki$(/l)$(br2)$(l:https://wiki.computercraft.cc/Main_Page)CCTweaked Wiki (incomplete)$(/l)$(br2)$(l:https://tweaked.cc/)Documentation of functions$(/l)
